about_the_game:
Blade Bounce has you exploring through the depths of an underground cave system, uncovering various locations as you solve puzzles, bouncing on enemies and objects with your magic spear, and taking a dog named Bob back to his home.



- 9 Worlds with unique level gimmicks

- Levels that test both your platforming prowess and puzzle-solving

- Bonus levels that require precision and great platforming to succeed

- A silly story about a dog with a cape trying to get back to his family

The game is designed to be simple and accessible, entertaining for casuals but with a large skill ceiling for people looking for more of a challenge. Regardless of skill level, you'll still enjoy the simple, enjoyable gameplay loop of pogoing on things with your blade.
